description: Detects usage of Msiexec.exe to install packages hosted remotely quietly
name: Suspicious Msiexec Quiet Install From Remote Location
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\msiexec.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"msiexec.exe") AND process.command_line.text:(*\/i* OR *\-i* OR *\/package* OR *\-package* OR *\/a* OR *\-a* OR *\/j* OR *\-j*) AND process.command_line.text:(*\/q* OR *\-q*) AND process.command_line.text:(*http* OR *\\\\\*))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
